CANCELLED Todays PM Daily MeetingThe pm Daily Update Meeting has been cancelled for today November th but is expected to resume Tuesday November th at the regularly scheduled place and time Thank you Heather Choate x On behalf of Christina Valdez Original Message From Beck Sally Sent Tuesday November PM To Subject PM Daily Meeting As discussed yesterday we will have a pm meeting daily to update you on details regarding the merger We will begin this meeting today Novmeber and will continue this as long as you find it useful The meeting will be held each day in ECS same conference room that we were in on Monday morning Mark Taylor will join us from Legal this afternoon He will discuss terms of the merger agreement and will answer questions that you may have We will also discuss our ENW plans for a PRC Lite There is no need to RSVP to this meeting each day The meeting will be held daily for all of those who can attend Sally

CANCELLED Wednesday PM Daily MeetingThe pm Daily Update Meeting has been cancelled for WEDNESDAY November st Thank you Heather Choate x On behalf of Christina Valdez Original Message From Beck Sally Sent Tuesday November PM To Subject PM Daily Meeting As discussed yesterday we will have a pm meeting daily to update you on details regarding the merger We will begin this meeting today Novmeber and will continue this as long as you find it useful The meeting will be held each day in ECS same conference room that we were in on Monday morning Mark Taylor will join us from Legal this afternoon He will discuss terms of the merger agreement and will answer questions that you may have We will also discuss our ENW plans for a PRC Lite There is no need to RSVP to this meeting each day The meeting will be held daily for all of those who can attend Sally
CANCELED Daily Update Meeting Cc Hi There Todays pm Daily Update Meeting has been canceled Have a great afternoon Thanks Blanca Carrizales for Christina Valdez

FW Deal Count and Tenor InformationOriginal Message From Moorer Torrey Sent Wednesday November PM To Beck Sally Wenz Michelle Cc Puthigai Savita Denny Jennifer Subject Deal Count and Tenor Information Hi Sally Michelle Attached is the expandedrevised deal data for the banker presentation The daily deal counts listed are based on averages for the months of August September and October The tenor information provided in the boxes to the right compare average EOL and OTC tenor for the last trading week to the average tenors during the same week last month Just let me know if you have any questions or need any additional information Thanks Torrey Moorer EnronOnline Product Control Group

Golf Tournament Monday November REMINDERYOUR REGISTERED TO PLAY Monday November The Golf Tournament at Raveneaux Country Club Address Cypress Wood Drive Phone Registration Range Balls am Noon Shotgun Start Includes Hole Sponsorship Sign Green Fees for Four Players Range Balls for Four Players Recognition in Program Golf Carts Lunches Dinners Raveneaux Country Club requires Golf Attire and soft spikes only The Tournament is a Person Team Florida Scramble format Teams Thanks Christina Valdez Enron Net Works LLC Phone Fax

November Golf Tournamentth Annual Golf Tournament benefiting the Klein High School Drill Team Monday November at Raveneaux Country Club Cypresswood Drive AM Check In NOON Shotgun Start Includes Box Lunch Fajita Buffet following tournament Golf Cart Range Balls Directions From Downtown Go I North to Beltway Sam Houston Tollway Go West on Beltway Exit Beltway at Hwy Go North on Hwy Exit at Cypresswood Drive Turn right on Cypresswood Drive Ravenaux will be on your right after crossing railroad tracks and the bridge over Cypress Creek Raveneaux Country Club requires Golf Attire and soft spikes only The tournament is a Person Team Florida Scramble format Please contact Christina Valdez or Heather Choate at x for changes to teams include name and handicap of substitute player

Meetings wSolomon Smith Barney Michael Schenker and Cliff Verron Cc PST With the approval of Sally Beck Michael Schenker Solomon Smith Barney has asked for me to coordinate meetings for those of you listed to meet with he and Cliff Verron These meetings will be oneonone for a hour period Please email me your preferred time slot for either Tuesday January or Wednesday January ASAP We need to send a schedule to him before he leaves New York for Houston today Date Tuesday January OR Wednesday January Topic Functional Alignment Between the Two Organizations Length of Meeting hrs Conf Rm ECS Thank you Christina Valdez Asst to Sally Beck Enron Net Works LLC Phone Fax

FW Dial in number for daily calls Cc PST FYI Original Message From ENRON Sent Friday February PM To Valdez Christina Cc Subject Dial in number for daily calls Christina Hello Ive asked Lisa Haughton to setup a dial in number for these daily calls since it might be easier starting with Tues Feb Lisa will email you with the details thanks Liliana Reply Separator Subject Meeting Time Changed Monday Feb Daily Review of Author ChristinaValdez Christina NRONcom at unixmime Date PM Sally has a Drs Appt on Monday Feb therefore she has asked that I move t he meeting time Mon Feb only to review the task list from am to am CST For those of you outside the office please let me know if you would like for me to conference you in by phone Unless you are scheduled to be on vacation please make every effort to attend t hese meetings daily so we can assure all tasks are updated Thank you Christina Valdez Epperson Assistant to Sally Beck Enron Net Works LLC Phone Fax This email is the property of
